name: Death Star Gunner (V)
Lore: 'Most gunners in the Imperial Navy once aspired to be TIE pilots, but lacked sufficient skills to fly starfighters. A few were assigned to the Death Star to man the main artillery.',
Text: 'While on Death Star: cancels Force drain bonuses from Death Star sites'' game text, your [A New Hope] Epic Event total is cumulatively +2, and during your deploy phase, may place this character in Used Pile to take a Superlaser into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
